pullRequest.title: Small soulbound improvement
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Very quick change to add a slimefun:soulbound key. Also added a utility method to add the lore alongside the key in SlimefunUtils.
Changes
Added slimefun:soulbound key, SlimefunUtils.setSoulbound(ItemStack) and made SoulboundRune use this. (Couldn't find other uses of "Soulbound", others uses can be added later).
Related Issues
N/A
Checklist


 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.

commit.message: Quick soulbound key to speed this up

nodes.bodyText: Could probably use a "boolean soulbound" argument to toggle it.
Should probably also do a check whether it is already soulbound or not.
